choices: Offered to help regardless of her reasons.
11221221.content: Sabrina saw her friend putting herself into a diaper. Did she give Carly Beth the chance to explain?
11221221.title: The School Restroom

11221222.content: Carleys bedroom. She thought she was home alone
11221222.title: Somewhere Else

112212221.content: Carley Beth has just arrived home from a long day at school and was feeling stressed. She hated feeling stressed since her experience with the haunted mask. She quickly dropped her her backpack and grabbed one of her pink four tabbed adult baby diaper. She had the diaper partially on when Sabrina burst in and....
112212221.title: Bedroom

choices: Calmed her, and helped her get it on.
Did something else to help her calm down.
1122122211.content: In a panic, Carly attempted to hide it. Sabrina, seeing this...
1122122211.title: Carley freaks out

1122122212.content: The reason for this was she knwe Sabrina would help her with this?
1122122212.title: Carley doesn’t care

choices: You would do that - loves it
11221222122.content:
Carley knew she wanted to tell someone her secret she just didn’t know how to or who to tell. With Sabrina seeing her with the big pink baby looking diaper on she guessed her secret was out. Carley attaches the last of the four tapes and stood up in a pink princess adult diaper.

Before Sabrina can comment Carley explains why she wears them and Sabrina seems to understand.

“So who changes you when you wet yourself,” Sabrina asked.

“I change myself Carley,” answers.

“Well how about now I will be your official babysitter,” Sabrina says.

Carley replies
11221222122.title: SE

112212221221.content:
"You'd do that?"
"Sure."
"Thanks."
Carly then...
112212221221.title: You would do that - loves it

As Lizzie was cradling this baby she found seemingly abandoned outside, the baby looked up at Lizzie with her eyes half open and muttered "mama".

hearing this, Lizzie...
1211311.title: Muttered mama.

12113111.content:
Lizzie smiled, cooing.
"Hey, mama's here, babygirl."
She then...

Was uneasy about it, not sure if she'd be a good big sister.

info.brief_description: the girls of the goosebumps franchise are diapered. why is your choice.
info.description:
since most of the franchise are stand alones, this will be an expanded universe.

here are the rules for this.

Rule 1. always leave a "something else" option to keep the reasons going.

Rule 2. no weight gain.

Rule 3. no killing off characters.

Rule 4. no instant or quick ends on the paths(I will delete those)

Rule 5. no insulting religion.

Rule 6. absolutely no troll chapters, or you will be blocked

Rule 7. there are currently hundreds of books, so just because any of you don't know any other characters doesn't mean that's all of them.

otherwise have fun. :)
